title: Louie
lyrics:
You see you're drivin’ round town with your
Chip on your shoulder
Well, let’s see who gets the last laugh
After I call her
I feel cold

Oh lord, I feel cold

I feel cold



When I’m gone you’ll be there

When I’m gone you’ll take care

When I’m gone you’ll be older

When I’m gone there’ll be no one to hold her



I feel cold

Oh lord, I feel cold

I feel cold



And I never call

It wasn’t your fault

Go be a chip on a shoulder

You will be ten times bigger and colder



I feel cold

Oh lord, I feel cold

I feel cold
